productservice.selectproducts: Select the Products that you would like to tag as “OPAL Certified”. Chances of receiving more Tender Opportunities is high from OPAL Buyers, if all your Products are OPAL Certified.
productservice.submproduct: Submission of either one Product or Service information is mandatory for you to Apply for a OPAL Supply Chain Certificate.
productservice.selectfinisgood: Select the Finished Goods that you would like to tag as “OPAL Certified”. Chances of receiving more Tender Opportunities is high from OPAL Buyers, if all your Finished Goods are OPAL Certified.
productservice.selectindusservice: Submission of either one Finished Goods or Service information is mandatory for you to Apply for a OPAL Industrial Organization (OISSR) Certificate.
productservice.selectserOPALcer: Select the Services that you would like to tag as "OPAL Certified". Chances of receiving more Tender Opportunities is high from OPAL Buyers, if all your Services are OPAL Certified.
productservice.subprodservice: Submission of either one Product or Service information is mandatory for you to Apply for a OPAL Supply Chain Certificate.

enterpriseadmin.title: Welcome to Enterprise Admin
enterpriseadmin.subtititle: The powerful Configuration Module that adapts your Enterprise on OPAL.
enterpriseadmin.discription: Build your Enterprise online by adding Users, creating Divisions, and Departments (with Team Members within your organization).
enterpriseadmin.subdiscription: Users can be mapped to a Division under a particular Department.
enterpriseadmin.teammember: Or, you can invite your Team Members to register as a User on OPAL with an option to create an individual User Profile.
enterpriseadmin.seletheactiplace: Select the Activities that are associated with your company’s Branch Office.
enterpriseadmin.searbydiviplace: Search by Division Reference Name / Division (Sector)
